Contact.subject: Subject

About.title: About Tiskre-DO
About.intro: We are a small family business from Tallinn, Estonia. Our mission is to bring our vision of the dream outdoor lifestyle to life — crafted in metal. If our ideas resonate with yours, we'd be truly happy to connect.
About.philosophyText: We believe good design should feel natural. Every piece we create is shaped by hand, not hype. Durable, practical and quietly beautiful — that's how we imagine the perfect outdoor space.
About.craftedText: We design and build durable products that live outdoors. Thoughtful details, honest materials and long service are at the heart of what we do.
About.peopleText: What inspires us most is the outdoors—simple forms and robust workmanship that blend into the landscape.
About.rootsText: We try to hold strong to our roots.
